alert.note: Alert for Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Houston; Madison; Trinity; Walker; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong line of thunderstorms will impact portions of central Trinity, Burleson, northern Grimes, Brazos, northwestern Washington, Houston, Madison and northern Walker Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 451 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong line of thunderstorms extending from 6 miles northwest of Kennard to 6 miles northeast of Caldwell. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... College Station, Bryan, Crockett, Madisonville, Caldwell, Austonio, Apple Springs, Trinity, Somerville, Lovelady, Snook, Bedias, Kurten, Kennard, Latexo, Wixon Valley, Millican, Lake Somerville Dam, Kyle Field and Lake Somerville State Park & Trailway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brazos; Burleson; Grimes; Houston; Madison; Trinity; Walker; Washington
